thread.title: These Iridescent Skateboards are Literal Works of Art
thread.title_full: These Iridescent Skateboards are Literal Works of Art

author: Graeme Campbell
title: These Iridescent Skateboards are Literal Works of Art
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
For those looking to make a head-turning statement at the local skatepark, designer Nick Thomm has come up with the perfect board. Available in strictly limited qualities, the gorgeous holographic skateboard features an iridescent surface on both sides. If David Bowie was a skater, he would’ve rode something like this.
Each board is made by hand and is totally unique. Thomm describes the designs as luxury art objects, but the boards do remain skat-able. The holographic finish has been applied to 100% Canadian Maple Skateboards, while clear grip tape is available to avoid covering the top side of the board.
Buy Now / $229 Buy via the link above, but also note all orders are final with no returns or exchanges.
Now watch Call Me 917’s latest skate edit.
